thread.title: Carlo Vedova impressed with facilities at Musannah Sports City
thread.title_full: Carlo Vedova impressed with facilities at Musannah Sports City

author: muscatdaily@apexmedia.co.om (Muscat Daily News)
title: Carlo Vedova impressed with facilities at Musannah Sports City
text:
Carlo Vedova impressed with facilities at Musannah Sports City Participants train in the waters of Musannah By Ashok Purohit October 19, 2015 
Carlo Dalla Vedova, the president of the RS:X class, was pleased with the arrangements at the Musannah Sports City and said ‘it is a perfect destination to host top-class events’. 
The Italian said, “Oman is fast becoming one of the top venues for international water sports competitions and it is not difficult to see why. That's because the conditions here are superb and the organising is top class. 
“I have to thank Rashid al Kindi (the head of the organising committee) for such high-class arrangements here and I am happy to have marked the tenth anniversary of the RS:X class in Oman,” Vedova said. 
“The sport is among the most-spectator friendly ones and we will have the races near the shore. The championship is expected to be of high standards as a lot is at stake for the windsurfers. We hope to witness exciting races over the next few days,” he said. 
The inaugural RS:X World Championships was held at Lake Garda, Italy in 2006, while subsequent worlds have been held in Cascais, Portugal; Auckland, New Zealand; Kerteminde, Denmark; Weymouth, UK; Perth, Australia; Cadiz, Spain; Buzios, Brazil; and Santander, Spain. Similar content
